amendment.description: To increase, with an offset, amounts available for the procurement of wheeled vehicles for the Army and the Marine Corps and for armor for such vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1314 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 199.

action.text: Amendment SA 1314 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8540-8542; text: CR S8540) To increase, with an offset, amounts available for the procurement of wheeled vehicles for the Army and the Marine Corps and for armor for such vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1314 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 199.
